text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Horgen District | native_name = Bezirk Horgen | settlement_type = District | image_map = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type2 = Canton | subdivision_name2 = | subdivision_type3 = Capital | subdivision_name3 = Horgen | area_total_km2 = 104.16 | area_footnotes = | population_as_of = | population_total = | population_footnotes = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone = CET | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = Municipalities | blank_info_sec1 = 9 }} Horgen is a district of the Swiss canton of Zürich. Its capital is Horgen. == Municipalities == Municipality Population () Area, km² Adliswil 7.79 Horgen-Sihlbrugg Dorf 21.07 Kilchberg 2.58 Langnau am Albis 8.66 Oberrieden 2.76 Richterswil-Samstagern 7.54 Rüschlikon 2.94 Thalwil 5.53 Wädenswil 17.37 Total 104.16 : Sihlbrugg Dorf and Samstagern are both significant villages that are not independent municipalities. == Sources ==
title: Horgen District
